blogPost.excerpt: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
blogPost.body: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
blogPost.title: Imitate - Learn French pronunciation with real-life videos
blogPost.author: Lars Karbo

localize.description: Imitate可以让你用youtube上的真人视频来练习发音，并让你听自己的录音，有一个即时的反馈循环。
localize.tagline: 通过真人视频学习法语发音。

localize.description: Imitate可以讓你用youtube上的真人視頻來練習發音，並讓你聽自己的錄音，有一個即時的反饋循環。
localize.tagline: 通過真人視頻學習法語發音。

previous.title:
Turns out Bitcoin is more correlated with the Dow than with tech stocks. 

Updating my model.

localize.full_text:
事实证明，比特币与道琼斯指数的相关性比与科技股的相关性更高。

更新了我的模型。

事實證明，比特幣與道瓊斯指數的相關性比與科技股的相關性更高。

更新了我的模型。
